upgrade.name: upgrade
upgrade.title: CiviCRM Version End-of-Life
upgrade.message:
CiviCRM 5.0 has reached its end-of-life. Security updates are not provided anymore. Please upgrade to the latest stable release.

Release history

5.1.0 was released on 2018-05-02. The latest patch revision is 5.1.2 (2018-05-16).
5.2.0 was released on 2018-06-06. The latest patch revision is 5.2.2 (2018-06-19).
5.3.0 was released on 2018-07-04. The latest patch revision is 5.3.2 (2018-07-25).
5.4.0 was released on 2018-08-01. The latest patch revision is 5.4.1 (2018-08-25).
5.5.0 was released on 2018-09-11. The latest patch revision is 5.5.3 (2018-09-25).
5.6.0 was released on 2018-10-03. The latest patch revision is 5.6.1 (2018-10-23).
5.7.0 was released on 2018-11-07. The latest patch revision is 5.7.2 (2018-11-20).
